scripts.repro: npm i && docker-compose up -d && echo "wait for mssql to start a minute :( ...." && sleep 5 && npm run db:reset && npm run db:seed && echo "use prisma and @prisma/client 4.10.0" && npm run --silent 410 && node index.js && echo "use prisma and @prisma/client 4.11.0" && npm run --silent 411 && node index.js
